Jaden Ivey is Ja Morant. Chet Holmgren is a more polished Rudy Gobert. Paolo Banchero is Chris Webber. 
OK, so maybe player comparisons for 2022 NBA Draft prospects don't totally fit nice and tidily… [+9243 chars]
